Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that are immediately preceded by Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER is followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of the variant starting with Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, compared to the total number of variants
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER events that eventually lead back to a successful Payment Handled
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER among all activities performed after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of times Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER appears in re-submission loops (i.e., after at least one prior rejection and resubmission)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of cases containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that include more than one resubmission cycle
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in variants that also contain Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that are not followed by any further activity (i.e., dead-end rejections)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER events associated with claim amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of all pre-approver interactions (Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER + Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER) that result in rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurrences relative to all rejection activities (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER, Declaration REJECTED by MISSING)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that occur in 2018 versus 2017
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases
